ygData.subject: Re: Laughing at Striker
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Thanks Alloran. But I m not going to respond to Windrazor until Shomin posts about the attack, so I can tell Windrazor what happened fully. Trainers

OOC: Thanks Alloran. But I'm not going to respond to Windrazor until 
Shomin posts about the attack, so I can tell Windrazor what happened 
fully.

Trainers

Prebon snickered as he kissed Spears again, wondering how much this 
was hurting Striker. He put his arm around her and used the comm on 
his other.

"Blaze, turn the cell guns on.(the cell guns flipped out of their 
panel.) Ignatius, come over here with some chains that tie around his 
puny little neck. Make them real tight. We'll walk him down to the 
med lab. If he tries to transform, the tightness of the collar will 
pop his head off."

Ignatius came with the rope.

"Alright Ignatius, get in there. Blaze, if he makes an attempt at 
something fire the guns. We are all to use everything possible to 
keep him at bay. Now let's go."

Ignatius opened the cell and stepped forward.

"Easy wolfy. Once we wipe your memory, it'll al be over and you can 
go home."
